Invite friends to trade for big rebates From now on, invite your friends to trade to get a permanent rebate, and the commission fee is up to 15%. Are you ready? Invited (number) Generate exclusive posters Copy share link Share to Invite Friends By the commission（USDT） View the rules Copied to clipboard Click to save the poster and send it to a friend Scan the QR code and invite you to join Exchief Save to album Copy link View the rules 1. After the friend accepts your invitation to register, the transaction fee will be deducted and the commission will be returned accordingly\n\n 2. Currently, we support the commission return activity of contract transaction, that is, the invitee will get the commission back as long as the contract transaction is carried out\n\n 3. The current return commission proportion is 15%, and the return commission cycle is permanent. The return commission settlement will automatically enter your currency account\n\n 4. Amount of returned commission = actual transaction fee * proportion of returned commission\n\n 5. All illegal and cheating behaviors, such as mutual brush of size and number, will be prohibited. Once found, the returned commission will be disqualified and cancelled\n\n 6. If the activity is adjusted, the latest rules of SSCoin shall prevail, and SSCoin shall have the right to the final interpretation of the activity

Please upload qr code of receipt Please enter your WeChat account Please enter other account Only one account can be selected for the same collection method Please select location Please set a fixed price Please enter floating scale Please enter purchase quantity Please select payment method Payment period (15~30 minutes) Please enter the payment term Please enter an integer and enter a value of 15-30 minutes You can set the transaction payment method in “Transaction Settings”. After setting, your payment account will be automatically presented in the advertisement information you posted. This will allow you to resend the payment account information or receive the QR code when you trade. Trading restrictions Transaction note Wechat account: xxxxx\n contact number: 18900000000\n After placing the order, you can directly add me to WeChat or contact me by phone, I will reply as soon as possible. You can set different single limits according to the transaction method. For example, the "maximum limit" can be adjusted according to the bank transfer or Alipay s single transfer limit. Increasing the "minimum limit" can also avoid receiving orders that are too low in transaction amount. Setting a suitable limit range will make your trading more efficient. During the validity period of the order, the digital currency corresponding to the order amount is locked by the system, and you cannot cancel the order actively. If the buyer does not mark the payment completed within the validity period of the order, the order will be automatically cancelled and the digital currency will be returned to your account. You can fill in the "Transaction Notes" to fill in the information you need to trade with you, such as leaving your payment account and contact details. Users who leave contact information can generally increase their chances of 30%. The note will be displayed to the other party after the order is created.。 In order to ensure the security of users transactions, the platform will adopt a digital currency custody system. It is strictly forbidden to bypass the platform for private transactions, and the offender will bear the loss and the permanent title. Please write down the trading conditions you want and the matters you need to pay attention to in the transaction description and transaction notes. The clear information will enhance your trading success rate and evaluation. Do not attempt fraud on this platform. Offenders will result in the account being frozen and legally liable. After the advertisement is posted, please fulfill the spirit of the contract, maliciously raise the price or repent, and the complaint will freeze the account for 3-14 days. note! Be sure to read the following information in detail to ensure your transaction is secure During the transaction, please confirm the payment and then release the digital currency. Do not disclose sensitive information about your account security during the transaction. Do not directly disclose your e-mail address to the buyer, otherwise you may receive fraudulent letters and damage to account security. Always make sure you are on the right platform website, please record the website on the bookmark to avoid accidental phishing websites. Platform employees will not trade with you on official names. Please do not trade with employees who claim to be platforms to avoid loss of profits.
